lenders.name: Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: There are a lot of hard working people in this world who could be very successful if given the opportunity to start their venture.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math to children who are 12-14 years old.

lenders.name: Rosalind
lenders.loan_because: Giveing is a gift from GOD you can not go wrong it make you feel good to know that you made a diffent in some one else life. If i can help some body as i travel alone then my giving will not be in vain.

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that no matter who you are or what your own life's circumstances are, there is always something you can do to help others. Even in these tough economic times, there is always someone whose need is greater than my own. There is nothing that makes me feel more alive and worthy than to give. It is an honor to help those helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of  two wonderful sons. They are the joys of my life! I have been a flight attendant for Delta Air Lines for 24 years, but changed positions at Delta just 2.5 years ago. I am now a customer service supervisor. Some day I hope to live off the grid in a little cabin or yurt and spent my retirement traveling by train, kayak, RV.......basically any mode of transportation at ground level!  (I've  already seen much of the world from 30,000 feet)!

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.occupation: EA to the Minister of Education, NS
lenders.loan_because: Having the ability and means to give is in itself a gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the President of my own non-profit organization which funds education for females in Uganda

lenders.name: jan & john
lenders.loan_because:
We won the birth lottery.  Others in our world have not been as fortunate.  Kiva gives us an opportunity to share our many blessings with someone who needs a helping hand up! 
we do what we can to support people within our own community but lending with Kiva allows us to help those who have nowhere else to turn.
lenders.occupational_info:
... we are both Christians trying to see the face of God where ever we turn and in whoever we meet.
... we are also "born straight but refuse to hate" so we fly the rainbow flag when opportunity arises.   We were very sad when we became aware of Kiva's connection to Strathmore University in Kenya and through that to Opus Dei.  We have been gradually lending less and withdrawing our money to use to help others elsewhere.  We still support the Fight Fistulas team and also the Tareto Maa team, both do wonderful work to save young girls from suffering, and also the Smile Train team who help children who need cleft surgery.  .

lenders.name: sylvester
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: n/a

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: In memory of my Mom and Dad.
lenders.occupational_info: Nonprofit medical management.

lenders.occupational_info: I have to superviser health and safety of workers

To be of service is the greatest gift!

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the library of a high school in the U.S.  These students receive a free education, yet so many of them do not appreciate it.  Students in many other countries have to pay for their education, and they appreciate it so much.  We are a selfish nation, unfortunately, and I feel fortunate to help someone in another country who appreciates every single thing they receive.  I wish the young people in the U.S. could see out of your eyes.  Thank you!

I have been bless with so much.  

Sharing my good fortune 
( financially, spiritually, or intellectually) 
is a way to give back to those that have 
helped me throughout my life.

I make an effort to enable children to see 
their paths and help them make a decision 
about  which to follow.

lenders.name: Colleen

"People who say it can not be done should not interrupt those of us who are doing it"  Unknown

The Oklahoma Gazette is a weekly news, arts and entertainment  newspaper and It was established in 1979. We also have a monthly magazine called OKCBiz.  Our Parent Company is called Tierra Media Group.  Check out our websites  www.okgazette.com &  www.OKC.BIZ

lenders.name: Kim

lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my 3 sons ages 8,6,and 3 and my husband.  My husband is a construction worker.  I have a wonderful family!!!

lenders.name: Lanny

lenders.name: Carolyn

lenders.occupational_info: I am a global project director running clinical trials all over the world.

lenders.name: Teri

lenders.name: sophie & renee

lenders.name: Sarah

My focus lies on female entrepreneurs with restaurant or catering in South America who'd like to invest in 'hardware'

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: There was a time when I was so poor that I could not have survived without the compassion, kindness and support of others who helped me through that rough patch of my life. Now it's my turn to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: Illness forced me to retire several years ago. Now I'm enjoying life with my husband and grandchildren. My passion is rippling light into the world in whatever little ways possible.

lenders.name: Harmony

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and I am in the military.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I am excited to see people given the opportunity to succeed!  Given the repayment rate, I know that you have been selected both because you have a personal commitment to succeed and because you have a good plan.   Good luck!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in many fields including education, real estate, electronic repair, restaurants (cooking and serving), computer programming and am currently doing retail sales (as is my wife Sue).

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe small acts of kindness can create a world of difference for others; which in turn, will help create a better world for everyone. It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an educator, who works with children.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way to help others do great things!

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: My mother taught me and leads by example, that it is the right thing to do. When you have what you need, give so that others can have what they need.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Teller at a Bank in Canada.

lenders.name: Cornelius Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference - this is one way.

lenders.name: MARTHA

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: micro-lending is a way to help people in distant towns and villages, hopefully help them change their lives for the better
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international humanitarian aid organization and work with First Nations in Canada

lenders.name: Meg and Dean
lenders.occupation: Church Pastor and Media Relations Director
lenders.loan_because: We loan to share our blessings and to spread the goodness of God.
lenders.occupational_info: Meg is a church minister in the United Church of Christ. Dean works for an athletics department of a university.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: Its another way I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I explore for Uranium in Canada.

lenders.name: Cheristy
lenders.loan_because: Because one person can make a difference

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It certainly makes a difference and helps others to improve their lives.  I feel honored to be able to give as much as possible...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a single father to two adopted boys from other countries...they are my world!

lenders.name: Don and Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I feel that the small business person is the foundation of any society. They were the backbone of the American dream.
lenders.occupational_info:
Along with being a former volunteer Commissioner of Public Housing for San Diego County I
work as the president of a tenants association in a senior apartment building. Retired people should give back as much as they can to their community.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.occupation: Program Coordinator for a social services organization
lenders.loan_because: I believe in world citizenship and global connectivity, that changing the world should start in your own backyard and extend to the other side of the globe.  I know that, living in the US, I take for granted a lot of opportunities that are not available to people in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have Autism.  I support them in developing important life skills and accessing the services and supports then need to lead a successful and independent life.

lenders.name: albert
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good, I am a father who is trying to show my young and beautiful daughter that we have the abilitly to help others and we should always look to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the great company of toyota, building cars and sending out parts to dealerships.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that I'm really helping someone fulfill their dream, goal or something important to them because they do not have the bevy of resources that we have in developed countries.  Many of us do not take advantage of all that we can, yet I am proud of someone in a poor country taking the chance to rise above their circumstances to make life better for themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for the elderly and infirm.

lenders.name: Nana
lenders.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
Winston Churchill
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of children and adults.

lenders.name: Carly
lenders.loan_because: I like making a difference and I love the personal stories!

lenders.name: Rose & John
lenders.loan_because: We are inspired by the initiative of these entrepreneurs and want to support them in whatever small way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: John is a retired businessman.  Rose was a family therapist.  Currently we enjoy our family and traveling.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: We all need a helping hand every now and then...
lenders.occupational_info: Fun, challenging and rewarding...

lenders.name: cristina
lenders.loan_because: I have never had an issue with giving a so called "handout" ,but Kiva turns that into a hand up. I have needed that in my life and been  fortunate enough to have family who helped me, so this is the least that I can do. Pay it forward baby, pay it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I cut, color & style hair, pretty much a universal trade.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: I am excited to see people empowered by just a bit of help from the outside... but I know to get a loan they have had to work hard to get where they are now!!  I am glad to help hardworking friends!  They are an inspiration to others!
lenders.occupational_info: I live in the Philippines helping friends with livelihood projects and small businesses

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: it is an effective way to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people start and grow their businesses.

lenders.name: Heidi Kai
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, trying to find my way in the world.

lenders.name: Joannie
lenders.loan_because: This organization is a great opportunity and I'm hoping to be able to help improve someone's life even just a little.  It makes me happy to be a part of Kiva. I also sponsor through World Vision.
lenders.occupational_info: Stay at home mom and owner of Joanniel Creations, my unique handmade jewellery line.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: We hope to help these people because we always have food on the table and a lot of people don't.
lenders.occupational_info: We work in a local hospital and for the local doctors.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I saw the Opra Winfrey show which inspired me to try to make a difference  for people trying to  improve their lives.

lenders.occupational_info: I own a yarn shop in a small rural town where women mostly come everyday andknit or crochet and talk about their lives good and bad. I sell relaxation and creativity!

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I can help other people.

lenders.name: LeAnn
lenders.loan_because: I believe in small steps for big change

lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their money

lenders.name: aarti

lenders.name: Betty

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hotel and make reservations.

lenders.name: Nga
lenders.loan_because: I want to help families who want to help themselves. Being Vietnamese, my family struggled to make it. I know all we ever wanted was a bit of help, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: It is fun to help those who are trying to help themselves!  It takes so little to assist someone to change their lives!!

lenders.name: Mike & Debbie
lenders.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: Real estate management.

lenders.name: www.omg-thatsit.com

lenders.occupational_info: Nimavation.com

lenders.name: Madhavi
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed throughout my life.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and am able to help.  Everyone needs some help sometime.  I have witnessed what a helping hand can do in my life.  It makes a world of difference when someone has faith in you.   I want to help someone else fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university.  My job is to plan the university president's social, athletic and cultural events.  I guess you can say I plan parties!

lenders.name: The Schneiders
lenders.loan_because: we believe in Kiva and believe in helping people who take the initiative to help themselves

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I enoying giving and look forward to watching hard working individuals get a head with a little help. It is kind of like give them a fish or show them how to fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with start up compaines with their marketing and product developement and also teach part time.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: It is imperative to provide opportunities
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the area of international environmental policy, focusing upon Canada's positions and obligations under the UNEP Stockholm Convention and the UNECE Convention on Long-range Transboundary Air Pollution

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to travel to many places in the world where poverty is  a way of live.  It helps to know how to help if only a bit.

lenders.name: Kenneth
lenders.loan_because: As I have traveled around the world I have come to realize how fortunate I am.  I hope my small loans can help others.

lenders.name: Ann W
lenders.loan_because: When I loan, I feel I make a difference in someone's future as well as my own.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of keeping the yard and property of the apartment complex where I live.  I keep public areas clean and safe, replace lights, care for trees and shrubs, pick up trash and respond to the concerns of tenants.

lenders.name: Deborah and Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: We have so much ourselves and it is amazing to see just how little it really takes from each person to hopefully make a real difference in someone else's life. Kiva helps to make this possible.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for what the universe has provided me and I want to make a difference in the world, no matter how big or small.
lenders.occupational_info: One of my life objectives is to show people that we can all make a difference. Giving Kiva gift certificates to my friends provides them the opportunity to see and decide how they can make a difference in other peoples' lives. Hopefully, they will pay it forward.

lenders.name: Joseph Battaglia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in the world deserves the opportunity to support their families! This is a small way I can help a fellow entrepreneur to succeed !
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a husband and a father of 2 children a daughter and a son.
Here in Canada I arrange financing for the purchase of real estate.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: I love helping women across the Globe become even better entrepreneurs!
lenders.occupational_info: I own 2 successful Internet Business' in the Real Estate Industry and the Self Help Industry.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who take the initiative to help themselves. I admire hardworking people and I like the Kiva organization because I am able to see where my money is going and after it is repaid, I can help another person.  Brilliant!
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a kindergarten teacher in Carson, CA.
I am also an Independent Beauty Consultant with Mary Kay Cosmetics.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO DO WHAT I CAN TO HELP.
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A VENDOR OF NATIVE JEWELERY,I SELL AT NATIVE AMERICAN GATHERINGS,POW WOWS ,ETC.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: i am thankful for every blessing and chance i have been given and believe in giving that to others as i know the peace and hope it brought me.
lenders.occupational_info: i work in a children's hospital with children who have been burned.  i support them emotionally by explaining what happens in their care and being supportive when family can't be with them. i do whatever possible to make a scary place and medical experience more kid friendly and less stressful.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives and reduce the huge gap in living standards worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for trucking companies to help them move their freight.

lenders.name: Jerry and Jacob
lenders.loan_because: For the price of 5 coffees I can help somebody to better their life? It's a "No brainer" !!!

lenders.name: adrienne
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling of giving. The life changing effects of this site is beauty for all that give to make a change for another person.

lenders.name: Melodie
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist people around the world to have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker who enjoys painting, cooking, baking and my grandchildren.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Just want to help
lenders.occupational_info: I suppy construction materials to the building industry

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone has the opportunity to make a difference in the world no matter how small, monetary or otherwise.  My family has raised me to share with others and help others.  As a small business owner, my father often made loans to employees and while he didn't always get the full amount back, he taught me about the importance of helping others so that they can first help themselves, then help others, as well.  It is with the idea of paying it forward that I continue to help others through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with young students on a daily basis- preparing them for their own great future.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to help someone.
